With its athletic details and timeless design, The Iconic Rugby Shirt captures the preppy yet sporty sensibility that has long defined the Polo Ralph Lauren brand. This version features all the hallmarks of a traditional rugby shirt—the white point collar, concealed placket, rubber buttons, and ribbed cuffs. Made from durable cotton jersey that stays true to the sport's rough-and-tumble heritage, this shirt will stand up to repeated wear on and off the field of play.
Twill rugby collar. Concealed three-button placket. Rubber buttons.
Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Even vented hem.
Signature embroidered pony at the left chest.
Cotton.
Machine washable.
Imported.

Dear Buyers . Kindly note that a very tiny percentage of full leather or semi leather products from our stock may have developed a mild musty leather smell over time. This may be due to the fact that some may have been in store with us for more than a year untouched. Anyone who doesn't prefer a leather product with this mild leathery odor, kindly message us beforehand so that we shall update the same and you can avoid
buying it.
Shipping :
1. We @ themonstersale use expedited shipping (Dhl express/ FedEx) for most of our shipments. Any remote area pin codes, Island nations and countries to which DHL express/ FedEx charges are very high we shall use EMS postal service (Speed post 8-15 days). The courier service used by us for any particular shipment will be purely our decision depending on the cost & location.
2. There may be some military addresses where neither DHL Express, FedEx or EMS (India speed post) services is available and we don’t ship to such addresses. If you fall under that category kindly inform us in advance with your postal address and Zip code before making a purchase we shall check and update you if shipping is possible or not.
3. All shipments shall be invoiced commercially (by parent company of themonstersale) and brand name of product shall not be mentioned on the invoice. For example if the item sold is “Micheal kors womens leather wallet”, the invoice will declare only “womens leather wallet”. This is because we don’t represent the brands we sell and are not by any means authorized reseller or distributor.
4. We shall undervalue all shipments in declaration/ invoice and not mention the actual “sold price” ! for example if item got sold for 1000$ we shall mention only 100-150 $ as value in invoice/ shipping declaration. This is because most customers have to pay heavy import duties in their respective countries.
5. If a customer wants us to update any particular value for shipment to avoid custom duties, we shall mention that price only in invoice/ shipping declaration.
6. All custom duties shall be paid by buyer not seller. Seller gives only free International shipping.
7. DHL express ideally takes 4-7 working days to deliver. But if is a delay due to shipment being held by local customs the seller is not responsible for the same.
Returns & refund
We don’t accept any returns as we ship from an international destination. If the product turns out to be different from what it was described then we may refund.
Only Authentic and not counterfeits :
We at themonstersale, sell only 100% authentic brands (Mostly manufacturers rejects/ manufacturers samples/ Shipment cancelled goods). Our customer ratings & feedbacks from buyers all over the world is a proof of the same. Kindly note we are not authorized sellers or distributors or in any way associated to any of the brands. We request all those who are not sure of the authenticity of our products before bidding or making a purchase can get in touch with us via messages, we shall be glad to answer all your queries & clear all doubts. Grailed is a fair market place and only those sellers who are honest and sell what they commit to, survive here and we expect buyers also to serious and honest.
Note: Buyers correct contact number is required after every purchase to book DHL shipments. Without contact number it’s not possible to book international shipments. Once purchase is made the buyer can leave contact number in Grailed messages.
Thank you for your cooperation
&
Happy Shopping!

Also any items of purchase value above 110$ comes under expedited shipping policy (4-9 working days). Also all remote area pin codes and addresses, and some countries and island nations* also fall under economic shipping category irrespective or value of purchase.

TERMS & CONDITIONS
Payment :
We accept Paypal as method of payment.
Shipping :
All orders are being shipped through Malaysia Pos Services within 1-3 days after receive of payment. We ship worldwide via airmail using Standard Flat Rate Service with tracking number. Shipping will take 14-21 working days depending on the buyer location.
To buyers from Canada and France please be notice that shipping will take more than usual time due to custom clearance and postal service from your country. Please be aware that, although we ship items within 1-3 days of your order (except Saturday and Sunday), the actual delivery might take some time. We purposefully don’t give any estimate on how long it might take, since items can get stuck in customs and postal services are unstable variables in terms of reliability.
For your protection as well as ours, orders will only ship to your confirmed address.
To ensure your delivery, we will include tracking number for you to check the delivery status. You can check your delivery status here : (http://bit.ly/2uXUW2s).
Courier service like Fedex and DHL is provided if you willing to pay for the shipping cost.
IMPORTANT NOTICE BEFORE YOU BUY FROM US.
The item you are about to buy is totally second-hand, that means it has been loved and worn by someone else before you, except we listed it as “new with tag”.
Please keep in mind that this is a second-hand item and some general wear should be expected. There might be tiny flaws or natural wear on the items. I will always do my best to describe any and all noted flaws and imperfections, but cannot guarantee that a vintage item has not come in contact with perfumes, smoke or other potential irritants. A cleaning is always recommended prior to wear. If nothing short of immaculate perfection will suit you, please buy new.
Although we try our best to be as true to the natural color of the item as possible, it can happen that there occur slight color variations between the item and the photo depending on the screen you view the photo on. That's because we did not use natural lighting at all. All pictures taken from our mini studio located in a room.
Any errors in listings are purely accidental. We go over everything we sell very diligently, but on very rare occasion may miss something. If there is anything that is not to your satisfaction, please contact us prior to leaving feedback. We will always accept items back for return and issue you a full refund in the event of any accidental misrepresentation.
Refund Policy:
Items must be returned in the exact same condition as received within 7 days of receipt of order.
Return shipping costs are the responsibility of the buyer.
Items will only be accepted for a full refund only in cases of misrepresentation. Items returned for any other reason will be assessed a 10% restocking fee. If you have any questions or concerns about a particular issue, please ask before purchasing.
Refund will be issued upon receipt and inspection of item. (Generally within 1 business day of receipt.)

ITPARPEL9BOL
This belt is in fantastic condition, if the belt buckle wasn’t scuffed this would be in near new condition. It has always been stored in the dust bag when not worn. - Belt buckle, pictured

description: Burberry is a global luxury fashion brand with a distinctive British identity. The brand was established in 1856 by Thomas Burberry who revolutionized rainwear with his invention of gabardine. This heritage remains key to Burberry’s iconic outerwear alongside a vision for fashion-forward collections, inspirational runway shows and an industry-leading position in digital technology. Based in London, under the creative direction of Riccardo Tisci, Burberry combines its heritage of innovation and craftsmanship in its design of womenswear, menswear, childrenswear, accessories and beauty.

sub_title: Supreme × Champion Zip Hoodie

description: Size XL Supreme x Champion reversible hooded jacket in camo. This is a rare size and color combination from the FW14 collection. I wore it for two seasons but I've moved to warmer climes so I haven't worn it in several years. The condition is good on both sides of the jacket. There's some minor sun discoloration on some of the grey reverse weave material around the hood and a very small amount on the front (it's barely noticeable, see the detailed photos). This is a great piece that can be styled as either a varsity jacket or a full camo jacket. It's a fairly heavy fall-winter piece that can get you through the winter with a synthetic filling that stays warm when wet. The tag is inside a hand pocket, I've done my best to display it in a photo.

This is the OG Champion x MoMa hoodie. The most sought after color. That means its the original cotton reverse weave fabric, not the stretchy BS cheap-fake reverse weave you see now. Also the "MoMa" appliqué is better quality. Sold out instantly. Timeless.
Gently worn and washed. Comes from a pet and smoke-free home. No rips, tears, or noticeable stains.
MoMA Exclusive: Champion first produced this hoodie sweatshirt in the 1930s to keep athletes warm during training. Our version has “MoMA” appliquéd in classic college-style lettering. The MoMA Champion Hoodie was first produced in connection with MoMA’s 2017 exhibition Items: Is Fashion Modern? An original version of the Champion Hoodie from the 1980s is an object in MoMA's collection.

description:
For sale is this parka/raincoat from the Rick Owens x Champion collaboration series. This coat has a long, oversized silhouette with wide sleeves so it can be worn layered over pretty much any jacket or on its own. Button closure and a strap on the back yoke that allows the coat to be worn over the shoulder when the weather clears up. Made of thin and extra-light nylon, this coat can be folded up and packed small enough to fit inside almost any shoulder bag or backpack. A simple but great looking piece with that bit of Rick Owens darkwear aesthetic.
Condition: 9/10. Only worn a handful of times. No flaws, just light wear.
Please don't hesitate to message me if you have any questions or concerns. Thank you!

Tops
*L- length from top to bottom
*W- also refers to chest or armpit-to-armpit
*H- hem is the bottom edge
Bottoms
*W- waist
*R-rise is from top center near navel area to crotch
*I- inseam is from the crotch area to the end of leg opening
*L- length also refers to outseam, from waist to bottom edge
*LO- leg opening, is the width at knee for shorts and ankle for pants

“It’s time for action, in the name of world peace.” Major figures who share this vision with UNIQLO have volunteered to design T-shirts embodying their peaceful wishes. All proceeds will be donated to international organizations supporting those affected by violence, discrimination, armed conflict, and poverty. The PEACE FOR ALL project is powered by each and every one of you who wears these T-shirts. Our wish is for a world in which all people can feel safe in their daily lives. UNIQLO will continue to broaden this initiative, working with people all around the world.
*UNIQLO parent company Fast Retailing Co., Ltd. will donate all profits (no less than 20% of the selling price) equally among UNHCR, Save the Children and Plan International Inc.
KAWS
Artist / KAWS engages audiences beyond the museums and galleries in which he regularly exhibits. Over the last two decades KAWS has built a successful career with work that consistently shows his formal agility as an artist, as well as his underlying wit, irreverence, and affection for our times.
"I wanted this design to serve as a reminder that we are all responsible for this planet and it’s our job to come together and care for it. Our relationship with Earth is fragile and we can't let it fall through our hands."

Innovative and multifaceted, Marni celebrates individuality through a playful spirit and subversive language. Marni is a state of mind with a history of friendly, humanist values combined with an experimental approach to materials and colours, as well as a unique flair for mixing prints and shapes. An avant-garde spirit holding constant dialogue with the world of art.
Appointed as Marni’s creative director in 2016, Sardinia-born Francesco Risso is leading the brand into a new era, mixing Marni’s essence with eccentricity and intellectualism, while bringing in his own aesthetic.

description:
In hand, SHIPS FAST
Sizes XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL available on my profile while they last
FIRM ON PRICE. It’s a good deal for a Brand new and never worn Kaws tee. The quality is great and the print is vibrant and lasts a long time. Many Kaws tees go for $80-100+
100% authentic
By purchasing you are donating to victims of poverty, discrimination, violence, conflict, and war to the UNHCR, Save the Children, & Plan International. Your donation will be indirect and the original donation was made when I purchased the tees and supports/incentivizes my business’s purchasing of clothing that goes to charity.
100% Cotton
PEACE FOR ALL
“It’s time for action, in the name of world peace.” Major figures who share this vision with UNIQLO have volunteered to design T-shirts embodying their peaceful wishes. All proceeds will be donated to international organizations supporting those affected by violence, discrimination, armed conflict, and poverty. The PEACE FOR ALL project is powered by each and every one of you who wears these T-shirts. Our wish is for a world in which all people can feel safe in their daily lives. UNIQLO will continue to broaden this initiative, working with people all around the world.
*UNIQLO parent company Fast Retailing Co., Ltd. will donate all profits (no less than 20% of the selling price) equally among UNHCR, Save the Children and Plan International Inc.
KAWS
Artist / KAWS engages audiences beyond the museums and galleries in which he regularly exhibits. Over the last two decades KAWS has built a successful career with work that consistently shows his formal agility as an artist, as well as his underlying wit, irreverence, and affection for our times.
"I wanted this design to serve as a reminder that we are all responsible for this planet and it’s our job to come together and care for it. Our relationship with Earth is fragile and we can't let it fall through our hands."

- The Paris design team, led by Christophe Lemaire, created a new collection of LifeWear using innovative fabrics and modern designs.

description:
Uniqlo U Wide-Fit Pullover Crewneck from SS20. Body 100% cotton, rib 88% cotton 12% polyester. (Better quality than FW20 version which is a cotton poly blend)
Retail price is 40$ before tax
Multiple Sizes available! MSG ME FOR YOUR SIZE!
Inspired by vintage athletic sweats. Elegant fleece-lined material that looks great with casual styles.
- The Paris design team, led by Christophe Lemaire, created a new collection of LifeWear using innovative fabrics and modern designs.
- On the surface, we used fleece-lined material that has been tightly knitted with elegant yarn, for a stylish silhouette.
- Tight fleece-lined material, so they do not feel like loungewear and can be worn for a variety of occasions.
- The neck width has been made slightly wider and the collar and hood have been made tighter around the front of the neck for a look that feels fresh and resembles vintage athletic parkas.
- Designed also with a wide silhouette, dropped shoulders, and a boxy silhouette.

“It’s time for action, in the name of world peace.” Major figures who share this vision with UNIQLO have volunteered to design T-shirts embodying their peaceful wishes. All proceeds will be donated to international organizations supporting those affected by violence, discrimination, armed conflict, and poverty. The PEACE FOR ALL project is powered by each and every one of you who wears these T-shirts. Our wish is for a world in which all people can feel safe in their daily lives. UNIQLO will continue to broaden this initiative, working with people all around the world.
*UNIQLO parent company Fast Retailing Co., Ltd. will donate all profits (no less than 20% of the selling price) equally among UNHCR, Save the Children and Plan International Inc.
KAWS
Artist / KAWS engages audiences beyond the museums and galleries in which he regularly exhibits. Over the last two decades KAWS has built a successful career with work that consistently shows his formal agility as an artist, as well as his underlying wit, irreverence, and affection for our times.
"I wanted this design to serve as a reminder that we are all responsible for this planet and it’s our job to come together and care for it. Our relationship with Earth is fragile and we can't let it fall through our hands."

description:

Condition: BRAND NEW. Never Used.
One Size 13.3” x 35.4” (34 x 90 cm)
A tenugui (手拭い), literally "hand-wiper", is a thin Japanese hand towel made from cotton. Typically, tenugui are about 35 by 90 centimetres (14 by 35 in) in size, plain woven, and almost always dyed with some pattern. Usually the long sides are finished with a selvage, and the short sides are just cut and so soon show some fraying.
A tenugui may be used as a flannel (washcloth) or dishcloth. They are often used as headbands, souvenirs, decorations, or for wrapping bottles and similar items. Towels made from terry cloth have largely replaced tenugui in household use. However, tenugui are still popular as souvenirs, decorations, and as a head covering in kendo, where it functions as a sweatband and provides extra padding beneath the headgear.
An iconic, "must have" accessory for fans of BAPE and Japanese Streetwear in general.

Description on measurement tags:
Tops
*L- length from top to bottom
*W- also refers to chest or armpit-to-armpit
*H- hem is the bottom edge
Bottoms
*W- waist
*R-rise is from top center near navel area to crotch
*I- inseam is from the crotch area to the end of leg opening
*L- length also refers to outseam, from waist to bottom edge

A luxurious 2-item set of fluffy Milo that can be used as a shoulder bag and pochette for the whole family, as a mobile pocket, or as a pouch is now available! The shoulder bag is a popular black item that matches any outfit. With 3 large pockets, it is easy to organize. If you wear it diagonally, both hands are free, so it's perfect for outdoor activities, going out to festivals, and daily use for parents who are raising children.

description:
BAPE Shoulder Bag & Mylo Pochette w/ AW 2022 Magazine
100% AUTHENTIC
GREAT FOR AUTUMN/WINTER!
Brand: BAPE®
Condition: Brand NEW IN BOX. 10/10. Never used.
A luxurious 2-item set of fluffy Milo that can be used as a shoulder bag and pochette for the whole family, as a mobile pocket, or as a pouch is now available! The shoulder bag is a popular black item that matches any outfit. With 3 large pockets, it is easy to organize. If you wear it diagonally, both hands are free, so it's perfect for outdoor activities, going out to festivals, and daily use for parents who are raising children.
In addition to being used as a pouch, the fluffy die-cut Milo can be attached to a shoulder bag to become a charm with a pocket, attached to a shoulder bag strap to become a pochette, or used alone as a "moving pocket" for kids!
Designed it so that you can enjoy it in 8 different ways depending on the combination with the bag.

Grail Alert. Arguably the most sought after pair of bapestas ever produced from Nigos time at Bape. Marvel collab produced in 2005 based of the superhero “Silver Surfer”. As seen on stars such as Lil Wayne in the Hustler Musik video & Soulja Boy. Only pair of these on grailed and probably the only real deadstock pair with box you will ever see again. Don’t sleep!

description:
BAPE Shoulder Bag & Mylo Pochette w/ AW 2022 Magazine
100% AUTHENTIC
GREAT FOR AUTUMN/WINTER!
Brand: BAPE®
Condition: Brand NEW IN BOX. 10/10. Never used.
A luxurious 2-item set of fluffy Milo that can be used as a shoulder bag and pochette for the whole family, as a mobile pocket, or as a pouch is now available! The shoulder bag is a popular black item that matches any outfit. With 3 large pockets, it is easy to organize. If you wear it diagonally, both hands are free, so it's perfect for outdoor activities, going out to festivals, and daily use for parents who are raising children.
In addition to being used as a pouch, the fluffy die-cut Milo can be attached to a shoulder bag to become a charm with a pocket, attached to a shoulder bag strap to become a pochette, or used alone as a "moving pocket" for kids!
Designed it so that you can enjoy it in 8 different ways depending on the combination with the bag.
Size: Shoulder bag (approx.): W25.5 x H19 x D6cm,
Milo pouch: Diameter 14cm, Shoulder strap length 120cm [maximum]

A luxurious 2-item set of fluffy Milo that can be used as a shoulder bag and pochette for the whole family, as a mobile pocket, or as a pouch is now available! The shoulder bag is a popular black item that matches any outfit. With 3 large pockets, it is easy to organize. Brand New - Never Used - Full Bottle
Key notes:
-Sandalwood
-Cardamom
-Ambrette
-Mandarin
-Petitgrain
An olfactory UFO based on sandalwood ventures toward the unknown
Taking a detour for an unforeseen destination. Following instinct, not reason. When embarking on the adventure of travel, chance encounters upend the most meticulously laid plans and magnify unexpected sensations. To embody that feeling, Master Perfumer Jacques Cavallier Belletrud cultivates mystery by using sandalwood of exceptional quality. Onto this spellbinding, milky wood he grafted ambrette seed, which at first evokes pear liqueur and then cottony musk. On the skin, spicy variations of cardamom add to the disruption. Au Hasard defies the codes of woody virility by giving it a disarming sensitivity. A totemic perfume.
The bottle is refillable in stores.
$245 shipped is final - not going lower on this
